articles.title: Fritz upends No. 4 Zverev, into 1st US Open semi - ESPN
articles.description: American Taylor Fritz took down No. 4 seed Alexander Zverev in the US Open quarterfinals Tuesday to reach his first major semifinal.
articles.content:
American Taylor Fritz earned his first berth in the final four of a major, beating No. 4 seed Alexander Zverev 7-6 (2), 3-6, 6-4, 7-6 (3) in the US Open quarterfinals Tuesday.
"I've had a lot of loo… [+4868 chars]

articles.title: Pressure to end war in Middle East mounts as hostage laid to rest - TODAY
articles.description: Large-scale protests erupted across Israel after the weekend deaths of six hostages in Gaza including a young American whose funeral was held on Monday. President Biden is reportedly considering offering a final “take it or leave it” deal to Israel and Hamas …

articles.title: Coronavirus vaccines, once free, are now pricey for uninsured people - The Washington Post
articles.description: The elimination of the Bridge Access Program means some low-income Americans must pay up to $200 for an updated shot.
articles.content:
As updated coronavirus vaccines hit U.S. pharmacy shelves, adults without health insurance are discovering the shots are no longer free, instead costing up to $200.
